Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Complete Phase 1 foundation implementation

Implemented all Phase 1 tasks for EHA Command Bots project:

Project Structure:
- Created complete directory structure for workflows, prompts, database, and docs
- Added .gitignore and .env.example for proper configuration management

Database Layer:
- Comprehensive SQL schema with 9 tables (story_arcs, missions, officers, players, etc.)
- Indexes and views for common queries
- Seed data with initial officer roster and sample story arc (Vanaar Incursion)

Officer Personalities:
- Detailed personality definitions for all 6 officers
- Commander Hayes (CO) - Strategic leadership
- Lt. Commander Chen (XO) - Operations coordination  
- Major Barrett (S3) - Tactical operations
- Lt. Rodriguez (S2) - Intelligence analysis
- Captain Morrison (S4) - Logistics management
- Lt. Singh - Communications and cyber warfare

Discord Bot:
- Minimal bot implementation focused on webhook handling
- Message routing to n8n workflows
- Conversation state tracking
- Configuration management via environment variables

n8n Workflow:
- Complete Commander Hayes workflow prototype
- Webhook trigger for Discord messages
- Claude API integration with personality prompts
- Response routing back to Discord

Documentation:
- Comprehensive SETUP.md with step-by-step instructions
- Database initialization scripts
- Environment configuration examples

All Phase 1 objectives completed and ready for Phase 2 development.
